application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3e (submission of details - details of existing and new service runs [plumbing / drainage / hotand cold water / air con pipework / heating pipework / extraction etc] including details of any associated alteration to fabric including alterations to joists, walling, external outlets, etc;) of listed building consent 24/02210 (External works: upgrade of air conditioning units; retrospective planning permission for replacement windows and security features; replacement glazing to windows and rooflights; additional lead coverings to parapets, side roofs and cornice decorations; render repairs; rain water pipe repairs; new mews house garden access, including formation of steps and handrail; faâ€¡ade and fence decorations; and solar panel installation and: Associated internal works: internal refurbishment to all rooms; new kitchens and bathrooms; demolition of internal walls; relocation of door openings; plaster mouldings and cornice upgrades to ceilings; replacement metal framed ceilings; wall enhancements with decorative wall panelling; swimming pool repairs; upgrade of building services and plant; passenger door relocation.)
